ygData.msgSnippet: Black Aracnia looks to the doors of the Triangle room as the slide open. In walk Tarantulas, and he is followed by Dark Mouse and Quickstrike. She turns away

    Black Aracnia looks to the doors of the Triangle room as the slide open. 
In walk Tarantulas, and he is followed by Dark Mouse and Quickstrike. She 
turns away from the computer.
    "Ah good. Glad you could make it. Quickstrike, we need your computer 
skills to get the main power generator up and running. Meantime DarkMouse and 
I will take a look around the bunker a little more. Tarantulas," She paused 
an looked at him in puzzlement for a moment, "You can start reading the 
commander, or whatever was in charge here, journal entry's. Got it?"
    Tarantulas transformed and nodded. He walked over to one of the terminals 
and began to read. Aracnia took Dark Mouses shoulder and began to lead her 
back out the door into the dark hallway to investigate.

    Megatron was indeed tired. Waspinators infernal humming was the only 
thing keeping him awake. He was mostly watching radar and filling out the 
daily report.
    "Megatron made cat bot commander! Why not Waspinator?" He said suddenly, 
with out any hesitation.
    Megatron turned a heavey optic to him. "Your stupid, and an idiot. Kitkat 
is smart a reliable. Answer your question?"
